title: I have been locked out of my phone twice and now have to do another factory reset, cannot keep going
content: I am locked out of my phone again.  The second time in two days.  Spent hours reinstalling everything and here I am again and desperately need my phone.  Third google device(2 Nexus 5's, each lasting a year.  I can no longer do this.  I love the performance but always some issue making them frustrating .
